item.title: 碧桂园任命法律顾问，敦促债权人保持耐心
item.description: 陷入困境的中国房地产开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Distressed Chinese property developer Country Garden Holdings Co. said it has engaged Linklaters LLP as the principal legal adviser for its offshore debt restructuring, while urging creditors to be patient with its progress.】

item.title: 华尔街在新兴市场追逐英伟达之外的人工智能赢家
item.description: 一些全球最大的基金经理正在美国之外寻找下一波人工智能赢家。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest money managers are searching for the next wave of artificial intelligence winners beyond the US.】

item.title: 中国人民银行连续第 17 个月购买黄金，黄金价格创历史新高
item.description: 3 月份，中国央行连续第 17 个月购买黄金作为储备，延续了长期以来的购买热潮，帮助贵金属飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：China’s central bank purchased gold for its reserves for a 17th straight month in March, extending a long buying spree that has helped the precious metal’s surge to a record.】

item.title: 印尼安全部队在金矿附近击毙两名巴布亚叛军领导人
item.description: 印尼贾亚普拉（美联社）— 警方周日称，在印尼巴布亚地区动荡不安的世界最大金矿之一附近，安全部队与其反叛组织发生枪战，两名巴布亚分离主义领导人被打死。【原文：JAYAPURA, Indonesia (AP) — Two Papuan separatist leaders were killed in a shootout between security forces and their rebel group near one of the world’s largest gold mines in Indonesia’s restive Papua region, police said Sunday.】

item.title: 企业青睐 "一带一路"，中国对澳投资减少
item.description: 根据毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）和悉尼大学（University of Sydney）的一份报告，2023 年中国私营企业和国有企业对澳大利亚的投资将降至 18 年来第二低的水平。【原文：Investment into Australia by Chinese private and state-owned companies tumbled in 2023 to the second-lowest level in 18 years, according to a report from KPMG and the University of Sydney.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司称 Akal-B 石油平台火灾造成九人受伤
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油公司称，其位于坎佩切河岸的一个 Akal-B 石油平台周六下午发生火灾，造成九人受伤。【原文：Mexico’s state-controlled oil company said a fire at one of its Akal-B oil platforms in the Campeche Bank left nine people injured Saturday afternoon.】

item.title: 荷兰银行首席执行官斯瓦克稳住贷款机构后开始下一步行动
item.description: 罗伯特-斯瓦克（Robert Swaak）在 Covid 大流行时加入荷兰银行，他的任务很明确：清理这家被救助的荷兰贷款机构，帮助国家出售其股份。他对下一篇章的期望似乎更低。【原文：Robert Swaak had a clear mission when he joined ABN Amro Bank NV in the midst of the Covid pandemic: clean up the bailed-out Dutch lender to help the state sell down its stake. His aspirations for the next chapter appear more modest.】

item.title: 研究显示，医院感染每年给非洲造成 84 亿美元的损失
item.description: 根据水援助组织（WaterAid）和世界银行（World Bank）的研究，治疗在医院和诊所获得的感染每年使撒哈拉以南非洲地区损失高达 84 亿美元，并造成数十万人可预防的死亡。【原文：Treating infections acquired in hospitals and clinics is costing sub-Saharan Africa as much as $8.4 billion a year and hundreds of thousands of preventable deaths, according to research by WaterAid and the World Bank.】

item.title: 越南将加大行动力度驯服黄金市场、打击走私
item.description: 稳定黄金市场是越南政府亟待解决的问题，因为走私者利用当地价格上涨的机会偷运贵金属，导致汇率扭曲和越南盾疲软，损害了越南经济。【原文：Stabilizing the gold market is a pressing issue for the Vietnamese government with smugglers taking advantage of higher local prices to slip in the precious metal, leading to exchange rate distortions and weakness in the dong that’s hurting the economy.】

item.title: 伯南克提示英国央行 "情景预测 "胜过美联储点阵图
item.description: 12 年前，本-伯南克将政策制定者的预测，包括他们对利率的展望，汇集成一组 "点阵图"，从而使美国联邦储备委员会站在了经济学的最前沿。【原文：Ben Bernanke put the US Federal Reserve on the cutting edge of economics 12 years ago by collecting policymakers’ forecasts, including their outlook for interest rates, into groups of “dot plots.”】

item.title: 中国对人民币红线的回应令交易商关注周一的汇率调整
item.description: 周一，交易员们将比往常更加密切地关注中国的每日人民币参考汇率，寻找上周人民币汇率向禁区走软之后的官方回击迹象。【原文：Traders will keep a closer eye than usual Monday on China’s daily yuan reference rate, looking for signs of official pushback after the currency weakened toward a no-go area last week.】

item.title: 新西兰因 "不可持续 "的移民而收紧工人签证
item.description: 新西兰政府以 "不可持续 "的净移民为由，立即对就业签证计划进行了修改，并表示可能会进一步修改。【原文：New Zealand’s government made immediate changes to an employment visa program, citing “unsustainable” net migration and flagging further potential changes.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔因突袭墨西哥大使馆而遭到整个拉丁美洲的抨击
item.description: 厄瓜多尔总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）将这一违反外交礼仪的行为与他打击犯罪团伙和贩毒集团的斗争联系在一起。【原文：Ecuador’s government drew condemnation across Latin America for storming the Mexican embassy to arrest a former vice president, a breach of diplomatic protocol that President Daniel Noboa linked to his fight against criminal gangs and cartels.】

item.title: Xcel Energy 将在大风中切断科罗拉多州部分地区的电力供应
item.description: Xcel Energy 表示，由于大风可能导致电线倒塌并引发野火，该公司将切断科罗拉多州约 5.5 万用户的电力供应。【原文：Xcel Energy said it will cut power to about 55,000 customers in Colorado due to high winds that could topple its power lines and spark wildfires.】

item.title: 通胀冰河期放缓将支撑美联储降息的谨慎态度
item.description: 下周的美国消费者价格数据紧随出人意料的强劲就业数据之后公布，预计将显示潜在通胀的缓慢放缓，这也是美联储对降息持谨慎态度的原因。【原文：US consumer-price data in the coming week, arriving on the heels of surprisingly strong jobs numbers, is projected to show a glacial slowdown in underlying inflation that explains the Federal Reserve’s cautious approach to lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 莱曼称他正努力拯救被骗 50 亿美元的美航
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁、交易商豪尔赫-保罗-莱曼（Jorge Paulo Lemann）说，他正与他的长期合作伙伴一起，努力拯救因 50 亿美元巨额欺诈而陷入破产保护的零售商 Americanas SA。【原文：Jorge Paulo Lemann, the billionaire Brazilian dealmaker, said that together with his long-time partners, he’s trying to save retailer Americanas SA after a massive $5 billion fraud pushed it into bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 欧洲因违约风险上升而回避风险最高的垃圾债券
item.description: 有越来越多的迹象表明，违约周期正在加快，对投资者来说，最垃圾的公司债务正变得越来越危险。【原文：The junkiest corporate debt is becoming increasingly hazardous for investors amid mounting signs that a default cycle is picking up steam.】

item.title: 美联储政策中枢停滞不前，无畏的股票牛市开始套期保值
item.description: S&P 500 指数本周的颠簸促使长期自满的交易者审视他们数月来忽视的对冲措施。【原文：A bumpy week for the S&P 500 Index prompted long-complacent traders to look at the hedges they’ve ignored for months.】

item.title: 意大利预计今年债务占 GDP 的比例 "肯定 "保持在 140% 以下
item.description: 意大利政府预计，今年的债务 "肯定 "会低于国内生产总值的 140%。【原文：Italy’s government expects debt this year to “surely” stay below 140% of gross domestic product.】

item.title: 从跳伞到品酒，纽约为日食做好准备
item.description: 周一，纽约州北部的多个城镇将迎来难得的聚光灯时刻，因为它们将被完全笼罩在黑暗之中。【原文：Cities and towns across a swath of upstate New York will have a rare moment in the spotlight on Monday — once they’re shrouded in complete darkness.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯称希腊经济增速可超越欧盟平均水平
item.description: 2016年11月25日星期五，希腊雅典，希腊央行行长亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）在该行总部接受采访时发表讲话。斯托纳拉斯说，现在谈论欧洲央行结束债券购买还 "为时过早"。摄影师：Yorgos Karahalis /Bloomberg【原文：Yannis Stournaras, governor of the Bank of Greece, speaks during an interview at the bank's headquarters in Athens, Greece, on Friday, Nov. 25, 2016. It's "far too early" to talk about winding down European Central Bank bond purchases, Stournaras said. Photographer: Yorgos Karahalis /Bloomberg】

item.title: 能源枯竭，几内亚将进一步削减电力供应
item.description: 几内亚国有电力公司表示，随着能源的枯竭，该公司将开始加大停电力度，并补充说它已没有足够的储备。【原文：Guinea’s state-owned power utility said it will start deepening power cuts as energy sources get depleted, adding it no longer has sufficient reserves.】

item.title: 据说西班牙普伊格公司最快将于下周一准备 IPO 文件
item.description:
据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙美容化妆品公司Puig集团计划最快于本周宣布首次公开募股的意向

。【原文：

Spanish beauty and cosmetics company Puig Group is planning to announce its intention to hold an initial public offering as soon as this coming week, according to people familiar with the matter

】

item.title: 据《每日电讯报》报道，麦格理拒绝收购希思罗机场股份
item.description: 据英国《每日电讯报》报道，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）已排除购买伦敦希思罗机场股份的可能性，从而使出售英国枢纽机场的计划面临风险。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. has ruled out purchasing a stake in London’s Heathrow Airport, putting a sale of the UK hub at risk, the Telegraph reported.】

item.title: 特斯拉的故事与增长有关。现在却成了问题
item.description: 本周，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc：如果高速增长的时代已经过去，那么埃隆-马斯克公司的股票到底值多少钱？【原文：Shockingly low quarterly sales figures from Tesla Inc. this week are raising a fundamental question for investors: If the days of breakneck growth are over, what are the shares of Elon Musk’s company really worth?】

item.title: 萨默斯说："永远不要'不看速度表就开车'。
item.description:
他表示，美国就业数据井喷意味着利率将在更长时间内保持较高水平

。【原文：

He says blowout US jobs print means rates will stay higher for longer

item.title: 据说 Naturgy 将搁置 26 亿美元的澳大利亚资产出售计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Naturgy Energy Group SA 出于对估值的考虑，已经搁置了出售其可再生能源部门 Global Power Generation 在澳大利亚资产的计划。【原文：Naturgy Energy Group SA has shelved plans to sell the Australian assets of its renewable energy unit Global Power Generation on valuation concerns, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 乌克兰寻找电网设备和弹药以避免夏季停电
item.description: 乌克兰能源部长格尔曼-加卢先科（German Galushchenko）说，乌克兰需要改进防空系统，以保护其能源资产免受俄罗斯导弹袭击，并避免今年夏天用电接近冬季高峰时出现停电。【原文：Ukraine needs improved air defenses to protect its energy assets from Russia’s missile attacks and avoid blackouts this summer when electricity use approaches its winter peak, Energy Minister German Galushchenko said.】

item.title: 开发商打赌班克赛德将成为后科维德时代伦敦的办公热点
item.description: 兰德证券集团收购了班克赛德（Bankside）的一块开发用地，认为泰晤士河南岸的这一地区完全有能力利用科维德事件后伦敦办公生活的变化。【原文：Land Securities Group Plc has acquired a development site in Bankside, betting the district on the south side of the Thames is well placed to take advantage of post-Covid shifts in London office life.】

item.title: 土耳其放宽银行强制购买政府债券的规定
item.description: 土耳其进一步放宽了强制银行购买政府债券的规定，并再次降低了安全维持率，这是土耳其为结束对贷款人的惩罚性措施而采取的最新措施。【原文：Turkey further eased regulations forcing banks to buy government bonds and reduced a security maintenance ratio again in its latest steps to end punitive measures on lenders.】
